name: myanimelist.net -- suigintou night theme ANIMELIST
description:
myanimelist.net -- suigintou night theme ANIMELIST

This style is for myanimelist.net custom anime/manga lists.
Usage:
a) Copy/paste anything within [MAL-style section] (below)
   in 'Advanced Style CSS Editor' on the MAL-site.
b) Using via stylish will override any other MAL-users custom styles for you.

discussions.name: How to put the picture I want?
